skills.title: Front-End & Back-End
skills.description: I bring expertise in front-end and back-end programming, leveraging Python, R, SQL, and AWS to develop intuitive interfaces and scalable systems. Focused on optimizing data management and process efficiency, I deliver robust solutions that enable effective decision-making and meet the demands of complex, data-driven environments

skills.title: Statistical Analysis
skills.description: With expertise in statistical analysis, I excel in data visualization, stochastic modeling, and machine learning using tools like R, Python, and Tableau. My experience includes GIS for spatial data analysis and disaster modeling, uncovering actionable insights and developing predictive models to address complex, data-driven challenges in dynamic industries

skills.title: (Re)Insurance
skills.description: Passionate about risk management, I am committed to driving innovation in the (re)insurance space. Currently pursuing my Associate in General Insurance (AINS) designation, I have developed a deep understanding of risk transfer mechanisms and policy development

skills.title: AI Automation
skills.description: Fueled by a passion for artificial intelligence, I have embarked on building an AI Automation business. My focus is on leveraging AI to streamline and revolutionize business processes, enabling organizations to achieve new levels of efficiency and innovation in their operations

portfolio.title: PRVCY
portfolio.description: A web application that leverages AWS services to help professionals both receive and send video submissions from users on the platform while protecting their privacy.

portfolio.title: Parrot Pricing
portfolio.description: A CamelCamelCamel clone built with PHP, SQL, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS, displaying product information from a database to help users track price and make informed purchasing decisions.

portfolio.title: Chatbot
portfolio.description: A Java-based chatbot that simulates conversations with a friend on topics like food, hobbies, and books, developed to practice software engineering teamwork tools like JIRA.
